verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou Lord, hast spoken,
Let there be light!
And as one man, O Lord,
We turn to Thee.
We now are seeing
Your glory and might,
And in Your presence, Lord,
We long to be!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
For Thine is the kingdom,
And Thine is the power,
and all glory forever more.
For we exalt Thee,
Bow down before Thee,
Emmanuel, Thou King of Kings.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou Lord hast established
Thy name on high,
And by Thy power
Draw Thy sons to Thy throne.
Father, forever most glorious, we die
To live a life that's found in Thee alone!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thou Lord hast determined
In Thy great plan
To have a people called
By Thy holy name,
Washed and made ready
By the blood of the Lamb,
A bride made spotless by Thy raging flame.
